content:
The Shmuel Langsam Family of Dobrow


From: "Rivka Turner"  
To: moishe@langsam.com 
Subject: langsam\diller from sanok 
Date: Tue, 15 Aug 2000 22:38:55 IDT 


hi, i searched for langsam and ended up at your site. my grandmother's maiden name was 
(sara) langsam the name diller is somehow  connected to us.
my grandmothers family is from sanok in galicia.
i would be interested in any material you have. if you have any questions i'll ask my 
mother or uncle. my grandmother died in 1985 her married name was wertenteil.
rivkasa@hotmail.com
______________________________________________________
Date: Mon, 28 Aug 2000 04:25:46 -0700
To: "Rivka Turner" 
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Re: langsam\diller from sanok

Hi,
Sorry for the delay, I just returned from vacation. I will reply in more detail later.
What is your connection to Yocheved Benjamin (if any)?
-Moishe Miller
www.langsam.com
moishe@langsam.com
______________________________________________________
From: "Rivka Turner"  
To: moishe@langsam.com 
Date: Mon, 28 Aug 2000 22:40:19 IDT 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Aug 2000 19:40:19.0386 (UTC) FILETIME=[CC35F9A0:01C01127] 


hi, thanks for writing back. Yocheved is my first cousin.
_________________________________________________________________________
Date: Tue, 29 Aug 2000 04:52:24 -0700
To: "Rivka Turner" 
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Re: langsam\diller from sanok

Hi,
You are H6 in the Langsam book. It lists quite a bit about your family. 
Yocheved went to school with my wife. Abe Balken works with me (same floor). 

I would love to explore more. The best thing would be to supply me with a fax number 
so I can send you a copy of your page. 

In the interim, can you ask your mother more about the Diller connection? 

I have lots more questions, but they will be more easily understood if you can see the 
existing research. 

One other thing. Have you seen my page on Diller as a link on 
http://www.ics.uci.edu/~dan/genealogy/Miller/langsam/langsam.htm
The actual page is at
http://www.ics.uci.edu/~dan/genealogy/Miller/langsam/naomi-g.htm


-Moishe
______________________________________________________
From: "Rivka Turner"  
To: moishe@langsam.com 
Subject: Re: langsam\diller from sanok 
Date: Tue, 29 Aug 2000 21:46:43 IDT 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 29 Aug 2000 18:46:43.0752 (UTC) FILETIME=[79F4EA80:01C011E9] 


my mother doesn't really know about the diller connection much. she just knows that we are 
connected. i have a friend that just got married and her new name is diller she said she'll 
try to find out.
i don't have a fax and i live in Israel so it would be easier just to give the page to abe 
(his wife is my first cousin). i went over your website and even copied some parts to my 
computer.
maybe my uncle (yocheved's father) knows more - he's in touch with my grandmother's sister 
who is still alive.
______________________________________________________
Date: Wed, 30 Aug 2000 00:05:26 -0700
To: "Rivka Turner" 
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Re: langsam\diller from sanok

OK, 
Let's start easy. I scanned it in. It is a gif file attachment. Can you read it?
Also, can you show this to your mother? Email it to anyone else?
Can you expand on it? Where do you fit on the attached view?
Thanks!
-Moishe

h6.gif
______________________________________________________
From: "Rivka Saffer"  
To: moishe@langsam.com 
Subject: Langsam-Diller 
Date: Thu, 31 Aug 2000 21:46:08 IDT 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 31 Aug 2000 18:46:09.0150 (UTC) FILETIME=[BA2891E0:01C0137B] 


The best thing would be to ask my uncle, Yocheved's father. My mother doesn't really know much 
about the family background.
_____________________________________________________________
Date: Fri, 01 Sep 2000 02:10:48 -0700
To: "Rivka Saffer" 
From: "moishe@langsam.com" 
Subject: Re: Langsam-Diller

OK, but can you still find out about the Diller connection???

Also, know any other Langsam's?

-Moishe
______________________________________________________
From: "Rivka Saffer"  
To: moishe@langsam.com 
Date: Fri, 01 Sep 2000 11:45:23 IDT 


I don't know other langsams. Next week i'll try to find out some information from my friend. 
I think her husband's grandfather (Diller) is a holocaust survivor.
_________________________________________________________________________
From: "Rivka Saffer"  
To: moishe@langsam.com 
Subject: langsam-diller 
Date: Tue, 12 Sep 2000 14:57:20 IDT 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 12 Sep 2000 11:57:20.0664 (UTC) FILETIME=[9AFFA180:01C01CB0] 


Hi, sorry for the delay. I haven't found out anything from my friend yet but I have another 
friend who's grandfathers name is also Diller. I will try to contact her.  I hope to get back 
to you in a few weeks.
_________________________________________________________________________


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 7/12/01
